SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Cart
Represents a shopping cart in a webshop.
CartHandler
Manages operations related to the Cart such as adding, removing items, and initializing cart.
CartItem
Represents an item in the shopping cart, including the Item object and its quantity.
CartItemInfo
Represents an item in the cart, along with its quantity, for the UI layer.
ControllerServlet
Handles the main routing for the web application.
DBManager
Manages database connections for the webshop system.
Item
Represents an individual item available in the webshop.
ItemDB
Manages database operations related to items in the webshop system.
ItemHandler
Handles operations related to Item objects such as fetching, removing, editing, and adding items.
ItemInfo
Represents information about an item for the UI layer.
Order
Represents an order placed by a user in the webshop.
OrderDB
Manages database operations related to orders in the webshop.
OrderHandler
Handles operations related to Order objects such as fetching, placing, and sending orders.
OrderInfo
Represents detailed information about an order for the UI layer.
PurchaseItemDB
Represents an item in a purchase order, extends the CartItem class.
User
Represents a user in the webshop system.
UserDB
Represents a user in the webshop database, extends the User class.
UserHandler
Handles user authentication and role verification in the webshop system.
UserInfo
Represents user information for the UI layer.
